wasara 2006 sita 2014 dakwa pawathi aanduwa karanu labu aarthika ka්riyakarakam (deshapalana wasi labaganima) adata da pahadili natha. 2015 mul karthuwa thula laba dun aanduwata daragatha nohaki sahana aadayam meyata nidasunya. 2002 ranil wika්ramasinha pa්ramukha eksath jathika paksha aanduwa mewani yojanawak kara thibuni.
